text: 42|23|Eta halo ta, yara susambada allah dena tamra bandaderake yara imana ane o satkaja kare. Baluna, 'ami era binimaye tomadera kacha theke atmiyatara sauhardya chara an'ya kono pratidana ca'i na [1].' Ye uttama kaja kare amara tara jan'ya ete kalyana bariye de'i. Niscaya allah atyanta ksamasila, gunagraahi.
